77556: Meaning, evil jinn tempted some pagan Arabs to believe that the angels are Allah’s daughters through female jinn.
77558: Some jinn used to eavesdrop on the heaven, then pass on what they heard to fortune-tellers. But this practice came to an end once Muḥammad (ﷺ) was sent as a messenger with the Quran.
77559: Meaning, to see if they will be grateful to Allah for rain and other provisions.
